## Installation

1. Download `webcamhead-X.X.X.jar` below
2. Place in your `.minecraft/mods` folder
3. Requires:
   - Minecraft 1.21.3
   - Fabric Loader 0.17.3+
   - Fabric API 0.114.1+1.21.3+
   - Java 21+

## Server Setup

To enable multiplayer webcam streaming, you need to run the streaming server:

```bash
cd streaming-server
npm install
npm start
```

See the [User Guide](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/mc-webcamhead/blob/main/USER_GUIDE.md) for detailed instructions.
